mapper.select: select A.CUST_ID,A.ORDER_NO,A.CARD_HOLDER,C.NAME,CASE WHEN A.FAIL_RESN_ID = 0 THEN NULL ELSE B.RESN_DESC END AS FAIL_REASON from SAL0323T A LEFT JOIN SYS0032M B on A.FAIL_RESN_ID = B.RESN_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M C ON A.CONVERT_STATUS = C.STUS_CODE_ID

select * from(select LPAD(NRIC, 12, '0') || LPAD(CUST_ID, 12, '0') || LPAD(SUBSTR(CARD_NO,0,6), 12, '0') refno, CARD_NO custCrcNo, CARD_EXP custCrcExpr from SAL0320D where 1=1 AND BATCH_TOKENIZE_ID = #{batchid} AND CONVERT_STATUS = 1) group by refno,CUSTCRCNO,CUSTCRCEXPR
mapper.update: update SAL0320D SET card_no = substr(card_no,0,6)||'******'||substr(card_no,-4,16) WHERE BATCH_TOKEN_ID = #{batchId}
mapper.select: SELECT GBSLCVD.SAL0319M_ID_SEQ.nextval as batchID FROM DUAL

SELECT A.BATCH_TOKENIZE_NO Batch_NO, COUNT(B.BATCH_TOKENIZE_ID) AS Total_Item ,A.BATCH_TOKENIZE_ID Batch_ID, D.NAME Batch_Status,A.CRT_DT Crt_Dt, C.USER_Name as Crt_User FROM SAL0319M A JOIN SAL0320D B ON A.BATCH_TOKENIZE_ID = B.BATCH_TOKENIZE_ID JOIN SYS0047M C ON A.CRT_USER_ID = C.USER_ID JOIN SYS0038M D ON A.STATUS = D.STUS_CODE_ID WHERE A.BATCH_TOKENIZE_ID = #{batchId} GROUP BY A.BATCH_TOKENIZE_NO,D.NAME,A.CRT_DT,C.USER_Name,A.BATCH_TOKENIZE_ID

SELECT B.ORDER_NO, B.CUST_ID ,B.CARD_NO,D.NAME Status,C.RESN_DESC,B.UDP_DT UDP_Dt FROM SAL0320D B LEFT JOIN SYS0032M C ON C.RESN_ID = B.FAIL_RESN_ID JOIN SYS0038M D ON B.CONVERT_STATUS = D.STUS_CODE_ID WHERE B.BATCH_TOKENIZE_ID = #{batchId} ORDER BY B.CUST_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAL0319M values( #{batchid}, 'BPC'||LPAD(#{batchid}, 7, '0'), 1, NULL, #{userId}, sysdate, #{userId}, sysdate )

INSERT into sal0320D ( select #{batchid},order_no, CASE WHEN b.sales_ord_no = NULL THEN 21 WHEN c.mode_id = 135 THEN 21 ELSE status END ,A.CUST_ID ,nric,CARD_NO,CARD_EXP,CARD_TYPE,card_holder,BANKNAME,sysdate,#{userId},sysdate,#{userId},crc_type, CASE WHEN c.mode_id = 135 THEN 3496 ELSE a.fail_resn_id END , null FROM (select 112 batch_id, regexp_substr(order_no, '[^\s **]+', 1, level) order_no, CASE WHEN fail_resn_id <> 0 THEN 21 ELSE 1 END AS status, CUST_ID,nric,CARD_NO,CARD_EXP,CARD_TYPE,card_holder,BANKNAME,crc_type, fail_resn_id, null from sal0323T connect by regexp_substr(order_no, '[^\s **]+', 1, level) is not null AND PRIOR cust_id = cust_id AND PRIOR SYS_GUID() IS NOT NULL) a LEFT JOIN sal0001d b on b.sales_ord_no = a.order_no LEFT JOIN sal0074d c on b.sales_ord_id = c.sales_ord_id)
